word:
Edson spoke of Father's chair. I thought you all knew what chair I meant. It is in your house--the patent rocker. The chair was purchased in Texas, sent to Colorado, and then to Battle Creek. I wanted it sent to California, but if it is not, never mind.--Letter 113, 1886. 







Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
April 18, 1991. Entire Letter
